title: Switch RTimer to use nanoTime
description:
Follow on from SOLR-6275 where I meant to move QTime measurement to directly start at dispatch filter and switch RTimer to using nanoTime.

Turns out the patch never did the latter, here's an issue to actually do that.

comments.author: Ramkumar Aiyengar
comments.content: Patch to switch RTimer to nanoTime. Also got a new test suite for this class.
